  • メソッド
org.interledger.ilqp

インタフェース QuoteService<T extends QuoteRequest,R extends QuoteResponse>

  • 型パラメータ:
    T - the type of the input to the service.
    R - the type of the result of the service.

    public interface QuoteService<T extends QuoteRequest,R extends QuoteResponse>
    A quote service delivers quote requests to connectors and returns their response.

    • メソッドのサマリー

      すべてのメソッド インスタンス・メソッド abstractメソッド 
      修飾子とタイプ メソッドと説明
      R requestQuote(T quoteRequest, InterledgerAddress connector)
      Requests a quote of the connector at the given address.
      R requestQuote(T quoteRequest, QuoteSelectionStrategy selectionStrategy)
      Requests a quote and applies the given selection strategy to return the best quote received.

    • メソッドの詳細

      • requestQuote

        R requestQuote(T quoteRequest,
               QuoteSelectionStrategy selectionStrategy)
        throws InterledgerQuotingException
        Requests a quote and applies the given selection strategy to return the best quote received.
        パラメータ:
        quoteRequest - The quote requested.
        selectionStrategy - A strategy for selecting the best of a given set of quote responses.
        戻り値:
        An instance R which is the best quote, or null if no responses where received.
        例外:
        InterledgerQuotingException

      • requestQuote

        R requestQuote(T quoteRequest,
               InterledgerAddress connector)
        throws InterledgerQuotingException
        Requests a quote of the connector at the given address.
        パラメータ:
        quoteRequest - The quote requested.
        connector - The ILP address of the connector to get the quote of.
        戻り値:
        The quote response of the connector, or null if no response is received.
        例外:
        InterledgerQuotingException
